chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
aerlli: append_entries_leaderLogs_interface
ollpti: one_leaderLog_per_term_interface
llsi: leaderLogs_sorted_interface
rlmli: refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
aercfli: append_entries_came_from_leaders_interface
aeli: allEntries_log_interface
lsi: leader_sublog_interface
lhsi: leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface

Goal:
forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_leader net

Premises:
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RRIR_init : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RRIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RRIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps
leaderLogs_leader = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> exists log' es : list entry, In (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)), log') (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) /\ log (snd (nwState net h)) = es ++ log' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_leader {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
raft_refined_base_params = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => GhostSimulations.refined_base_params : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> RaftParams orig_base_params -> BaseParams Arguments raft_refined_base_params {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

all_entries_leader_logs = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => leader_without_missing_entry net /\ appendEntriesRequest_exists_leaderLog net /\ appendEntriesRequest_leaderLog_not_in net /\ leaderLogs_leader net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments all_entries_leader_logs {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
update : (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface aerlli : append_entries_leaderLogs_interface ollpti : one_leaderLog_per_term_interface llsi : leaderLogs_sorted_interface rlmli : refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface aercfli : append_entries_came_from_leaders_interface aeli : allEntries_log_interface lsi : leader_sublog_interface lhsi : leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface |- Type] ?B : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface aerlli : append_entries_leaderLogs_interface ollpti : one_leaderLog_per_term_interface llsi : leaderLogs_sorted_interface rlmli : refined_log...
Record refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface { entries_contiguous_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_contiguous_nw net; entries_gt_0_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_gt_0_nw net; entries_sorted_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> eIndex e > 0 } Arguments refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
Record one_leaderLog_per_term_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_one_leaderLog_per_term_interface { one_leaderLog_per_term_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leaderLog_per_term net; one_leaderLog_per_term_log_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leaderLog_per_term_log net; one_leaderLog_per_term_host_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leaderLog_per_term_host net } Arguments one_leaderLog_per_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_one_leaderLog_per_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _)%function_scope
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
multi_params = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => {| Net.name := name; Net.msg := msg; Net.msg_eq_dec := msg_eq_dec; Net.name_eq_dec := name_eq_dec; Net.nodes := nodes; all_names_nodes := all_fin_all N; no_dup_nodes := all_fin_NoDup N; Net.init_handlers := init_handlers; net_handlers := RaftNetHandler; input_handlers := RaftInputHandler |} : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, MultiParams base_params Arguments multi_params {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
clientId = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (RaftParams0 : RaftParams orig_base_params) => let (_, _, _, clientId, _) := RaftParams0 in clientId : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments clientId {orig_base_params RaftParams}
base_params = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => {| data := raft_data; input := raft_input; output := raft_output |} : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> BaseParams Arguments base_params {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P ->...-> raft_intermediate_reachable (GhostSimulations.deghost net) } Arguments raft_refinement_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_raft_refinement_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
doGenericServer = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (h : name) (state : raft_data) => let (out, state0) := applyEntries h state (rev (filter (fun x : entry => (lastApplied state <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? commitIndex state)) (findGtIndex (log state) (lastApplied state)))) in (out, RaftState.set_raft_data_lastApplied term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output state0 (if lastApplied state0 <? commitIndex state0 then commitIndex state0 else lastApplied state0), []) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params ->...-> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments doGenericServer {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
lower_prop : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (GhostSimulations.deghost net)) -> forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net
lift_prop : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) -> forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (GhostSimulations.deghost net)
refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall net net' : network, (forall h : Net.name, nwState net h = nwState net' h) -> (forall p : packet, In p (nwPackets net') -> In p (nwPackets net)) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (network -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

Record allEntries_log_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_allEntries_log_interface { allEntries_log_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> allEntries_log net } Arguments allEntries_log_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_allEntries_log_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record append_entries_came_from_leaders_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_append_entries_came_from_leaders_interface { append_entries_came_from_leaders_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> append_entries_came_from_leaders net } Arguments append_entries_came_from_leaders_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_append_entries_came_from_leaders_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface { leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong net } Arguments leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record append_entries_leaderLogs_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_append_entries_leaderLogs_interface { append_entries_leaderLogs_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> append_entries_leaderLogs net } Arguments append_entries_leaderLogs_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_append_entries_leaderLogs_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record leaderLogs_sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_sorted_interface { leaderLogs_sorted_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_sorted net } Arguments leaderLogs_sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Build_refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface : (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_contiguous_nw net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_gt_0_nw net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_sorted_nw net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_gt_0 net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_contiguous net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_sorted net) -> (forall (net : network) (h h' : Net.name), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_match (log (snd (nwState net h))) (log (snd (nwState net h')))) ->...-> refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface

entries_contiguous_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_contiguous net
allEntries_log_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> allEntries_log net
one_leaderLog_per_term_host_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leaderLog_per_term_host net
append_entries_came_from_leaders_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> append_entries_came_from_leaders net
appendEntriesRequest_leaderLog_not_in_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> appendEntriesRequest_leaderLog_not_in net
appendEntriesRequest_exists_leaderLog_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> appendEntriesRequest_exists_leaderLog net

```coq
intros net H.
apply all_entries_leader_logs_invariant in H.
unfold all_entries_leader_logs in H.
destruct H as [_ [_ [_ H]]]. 
auto.
Qed.
```

original: intros net H. apply all_entries_leader_logs_invariant in H. unfold all_entries_leader_logs in H. destruct H as [_ [_ [_ H]]]. auto.
